verses.text: For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will have \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* on \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and will yet \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w set|strong="H3240"\w* them in their own \w land|strong="H0127"\w*: and the \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* shall be \w joined|strong="H3867"\w* with them, and they shall \w cleave|strong="H5596"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.

And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* them, and \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* them to their \w place|strong="H4725"\w*: and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall \w possess|strong="H5157"\w* them in the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* for \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* and \w handmaids|strong="H8198"\w*: and they shall take them \w captives|strong="H7617"\w*, whose \w captives|strong="H7617"\w* they were; and they shall \w rule|strong="H7287"\w* over their \w oppressors|strong="H5065"\w*.\f + \fr 14.2 \ft whose…: Heb. that had taken them captives\f*

And it shall come to pass in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall give thee \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* from thy \w sorrow|strong="H6090"\w*, and from thy \w fear|strong="H7267"\w*, and from the \w hard|strong="H7186"\w* \w bondage|strong="H5656"\w* wherein thou wast made to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w*,

¶ That thou shalt take \w up|strong="H5375"\w* this \w proverb|strong="H4912"\w* against the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, How hath the \w oppressor|strong="H5065"\w* \w ceased|strong="H7673"\w*! the golden \w city|strong="H4062"\w* \w ceased|strong="H7673"\w*!\f + \fr 14.4 \ft proverb: or, taunting speech\f*\f + \fr 14.4 \ft golden…: or, exactress of gold\f*

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* the \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, \add and\add* the \w sceptre|strong="H7626"\w* of the \w rulers|strong="H4910"\w*.

He who \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* in \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w* with a \w continual|strong="H1115"\w* \w stroke|strong="H4347"\w*, he that \w ruled|strong="H7287"\w* the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* in \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, is \w persecuted|strong="H4783"\w*, \add and\add* \w none|strong="H1097"\w* \w hindereth|strong="H2820"\w*. \f + \fr 14.6 \ft a continual…: Heb. a stroke without removing\f*
The whole \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* is at \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*, \add and\add* is \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w*: they break \w forth|strong="H6476"\w* into \w singing|strong="H7440"\w*.

Yea, the fir \w trees|strong="H1265"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* at thee, \add and\add* the \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w* of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, \add saying\add*, Since thou art laid \w down|strong="H7901"\w*, no \w feller|strong="H3772"\w* is come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against us.

\w Hell|strong="H7585"\w* from beneath is \w moved|strong="H7264"\w* for thee to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \add thee\add* at thy \w coming|strong="H0935"\w*: it stirreth \w up|strong="H5782"\w* the \w dead|strong="H7496"\w* for thee, \add even\add* all the chief \w ones|strong="H6260"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; it hath raised \w up|strong="H6965"\w* from their \w thrones|strong="H3678"\w* all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.\f + \fr 14.9 \ft Hell: or, The grave\f*\f + \fr 14.9 \ft chief…: Heb. leaders, or, great goats\f*
All they shall \w speak|strong="H6030"\w* and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto thee, Art thou also become \w weak|strong="H2470"\w* as we? art thou become \w like|strong="H4911"\w* unto us?

Thy \w pomp|strong="H1347"\w* is brought \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w grave|strong="H7585"\w*, \add and\add* the \w noise|strong="H1998"\w* of thy \w viols|strong="H5035"\w*: the \w worm|strong="H7415"\w* is \w spread|strong="H3331"\w* under thee, and the \w worms|strong="H8438"\w* \w cover|strong="H4374"\w* thee.

How art thou \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, O \w Lucifer|strong="H1966"\w*, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w morning|strong="H7837"\w*! \add how\add* art thou cut \w down|strong="H1438"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, which didst \w weaken|strong="H2522"\w* the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*!\f + \fr 14.12 \ft O Lucifer: or, O day star\f*

For thou hast \w said|strong="H0559"\w* in thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, I will \w ascend|strong="H5927"\w* into \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, I will \w exalt|strong="H7311"\w* my \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w* the \w stars|strong="H3556"\w* of \w God|strong="H0410"\w*: I will \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* also upon the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, in the \w sides|strong="H3411"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*:
I will \w ascend|strong="H5927"\w* above the \w heights|strong="H1116"\w* of the \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w*; I will be \w like|strong="H1819"\w* the most \w High|strong="H5945"\w*.
Yet thou shalt be brought \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w hell|strong="H7585"\w*, to the \w sides|strong="H3411"\w* of the \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*.

They that \w see|strong="H7200"\w* thee shall narrowly \w look|strong="H7688"\w* upon thee, \add and\add* \w consider|strong="H0995"\w* thee, \add saying, Is\add* this the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that made the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* to \w tremble|strong="H7264"\w*, that did \w shake|strong="H7493"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w*;

\add That\add* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* the \w world|strong="H8398"\w* as a \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, and \w destroyed|strong="H2040"\w* the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* thereof; \add that\add* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* not the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of his \w prisoners|strong="H0615"\w*?\f + \fr 14.17 \ft opened…: or, did not let his prisoners loose homeward?\f*

All the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \add even\add* all of them, \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* in \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*, every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* in his own \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

But thou art cast \w out|strong="H7993"\w* of thy \w grave|strong="H6913"\w* like an \w abominable|strong="H8581"\w* \w branch|strong="H5342"\w*, \add and as\add* the \w raiment|strong="H3830"\w* of those that are \w slain|strong="H2026"\w*, thrust \w through|strong="H2944"\w* with a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, that go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* of the \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*; as a \w carcase|strong="H6297"\w* trodden under \w feet|strong="H0947"\w*.

Thou shalt not be \w joined|strong="H3161"\w* with them in \w burial|strong="H6900"\w*, because thou hast \w destroyed|strong="H7843"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \add and\add* \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w evildoers|strong="H7489"\w* shall \w never|strong="H5769"\w* be \w renowned|strong="H7121"\w*.

\w Prepare|strong="H3559"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4293"\w* for his \w children|strong="H1121"\w* for the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*; that they do \w not|strong="H1077"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w*, nor \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, nor \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w world|strong="H8398"\w* with \w cities|strong="H6145"\w*.

For I will rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against them, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, and cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and \w remnant|strong="H7605"\w*, and \w son|strong="H5209"\w*, and \w nephew|strong="H5220"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

I will also \w make|strong="H7760"\w* it a \w possession|strong="H4180"\w* for the \w bittern|strong="H7090"\w*, and \w pools|strong="H0098"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w*: and I will \w sweep|strong="H2894"\w* it with the \w besom|strong="H4292"\w* of \w destruction|strong="H8045"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

¶ The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* hath \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Surely as I have \w thought|strong="H1819"\w*, so shall it come to pass; and as I have \w purposed|strong="H3289"\w*, \add so\add* shall it \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*:

That I will \w break|strong="H7665"\w* the \w Assyrian|strong="H0804"\w* in my \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and upon my \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* tread him under \w foot|strong="H0947"\w*: then shall his \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* from off them, and his \w burden|strong="H5448"\w* \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* from off their \w shoulders|strong="H7926"\w*.

This \add is\add* the \w purpose|strong="H6098"\w* that is \w purposed|strong="H3289"\w* upon the whole \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: and this \add is\add* the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* that is stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* upon all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* hath \w purposed|strong="H3289"\w*, and who shall \w disannul|strong="H6565"\w* \add it\add*? and his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add is\add* stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w*, and who shall turn it \w back|strong="H7725"\w*?
In the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* that \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* \w died|strong="H4194"\w* was this \w burden|strong="H4853"\w*.

¶ \w Rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* not thou, whole \w Palestina|strong="H6429"\w*, because the \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* of him that \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* thee is \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*: for out of the \w serpent’s|strong="H5175"\w* \w root|strong="H8328"\w* shall come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* a \w cockatrice|strong="H6848"\w*, and his \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \add shall be\add* a \w fiery|strong="H8314"\w* \w flying|strong="H5774"\w* \w serpent|strong="H8314"\w*.\f + \fr 14.29 \ft cockatrice: or, adder\f*

And the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* shall \w feed|strong="H7462"\w*, and the \w needy|strong="H0034"\w* shall lie \w down|strong="H7257"\w* in \w safety|strong="H0983"\w*: and I will \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* thy \w root|strong="H8328"\w* with \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, and he shall \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* thy \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w*.

\w Howl|strong="H3213"\w*, O \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*; \w cry|strong="H2199"\w*, O \w city|strong="H5892"\w*; thou, whole \w Palestina|strong="H6429"\w*, \add art\add* \w dissolved|strong="H4127"\w*: for there shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* from the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* a \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w*, and none \add shall be\add* \w alone|strong="H0909"\w* in his appointed \w times|strong="H4151"\w*.\f + \fr 14.31 \ft none…: or, he shall not be alone\f*\f + \fr 14.31 \ft appointed…: or, assemblies\f*

What shall \add one\add* then \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* the \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* of the \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*? That the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w founded|strong="H3245"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* of his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w trust|strong="H2620"\w* in it.\f + \fr 14.32 \ft trust…: or, betake themselves unto it\f*
